code: public void configure() throws Exception {     from("direct:in").process("hello"). }

@Test public void testProcessorRefMissConfigured() throws Exception {     try {         context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {              public void configure() throws Exception {                 from("direct:in").process("hello").             }         }).         fail("Should have thrown IllegalArgumentException").     } catch (FailedToCreateRouteException e) {         assertEquals("No bean could be found in the registry for: hello of type: org.apache.camel.Processor", e.getCause().getMessage()).     } }
